To start exploring, please simply navigate to tabs on the upper right corner. The table of contents is here:

2) "Intro to Bayesian": Bayesian philosophy; Bayes rules
3) "Gibbs Sampling": Gibbs Sampling Concept; Examples; Gibbs Sampling and Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC)
